content:
March Madness is always an exciting time! However, I need to clarify that the NCAA Men's Division I Basketball Championship, also known as March Madness, typically takes place in March and early April of each year.

Since we're still in the middle of the year, the 2023 NCAA March Madness tournament has not yet taken place. The 2022 NCAA Men's Division I Basketball Tournament concluded on April 4, 2022, with the Kansas Jayhawks winning the championship.

If you're interested in participating in a bracket challenge or following the tournament, I recommend keeping an eye on the official NCAA website or reliable sports news sources for updates on the 2023 tournament schedule, teams, and brackets. You can also start preparing for your next bracket challenge with your friends!

Let me know if you have any other questions or if there's anything else I can help you with!
